front.title: Methodology for Benchmarking MPLS-TE Fast Reroute Protection

abstract.t: This document describes the methodology for benchmarking MPLS Protection mechanisms for link and node protection as defined in [RFC 4090]. This document provides test methodologies and testbed setup for measuring failover times of Fast Reroute techniques while considering all other factors (such as underlying links) that might impact recovery times for real-time applications bound to MPLS traffic engineered (MPLS-TE) tunnels.
